channel.title: Room Occupancy Tracking
channel.description: Recent content on Room Occupancy Tracking

item.title: Interviews
item.description: Student Do you currently use the University’s room occupancy tracking system? No Why do you not use the current system? Have you ever used it? If ‘Yes’, what is the main reason you no longer use it? Yes Do you like the current system? Does it cover all the study spaces you use regularly? If not, where would you like to see it extended to? Have you ever attempted to use the current system, but found it to be unavailable?
